topic.title: Getting the bucket streaming URI
topic.shortdesc: To retrieve the streaming URI, use the GET operation with the /pools/default/buckets/default URI.

body.p:
The individual bucket request is exactly the same as what would be obtained from the item in the array for the entire buckets list. The streamingUri is exactly the same except it streams HTTP chunks using chunked encoding. A response of “



” delimits chunks. This will likely be converted to a “zero chunk” in a future release of this API, and thus the behavior of the streamingUri should be considered evolving.
